meanings.definition: A large deer with branching antlers.
meanings.sent1: The elks grazed peacefully in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of elks while hiking in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The elks decided to have a dance party in the clearing.
meanings.sent4: The majestic elks stood tall like kings of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the elks with their antlers was truly breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: We spotted a herd of elks on our road trip.
meanings.sent2: The elks crossed the river to reach the other side.
meanings.sent3: The elks threw a surprise party for their friend, the elk.
meanings.sent4: The elks, united in their journey, moved gracefully through the wilderness.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the elks' hooves echoed through the valley.
